name: Danger Zone
tagline: An upcoming unique Team Fortresss 2 gamemode created by Pierce 'NameUser' Strine.
body:
### Introduction
See below.

### About this gamemode
I'm not actually sure what this gamemode is about. This gamemode is coded in SourcePawn, concept by Pierce 'NameUser' Strine

### Current Features
Permanent thirdperson view
Screen shakes when you are shot/damaged.



### Proposed features
Store system for cosmetic upgrades (Bullet tracers, weapon color/particle effects, etc)
Death messages
Waiting for players music
Ranking system (Either Clientprefs or SQL)
Player colored (red, yellow, green) depending on health
Airblast blocked
Uber on spawn
Killstreak bonuses (3, 5, 7, and 9)
Pick-me-ups (Pill bottles which have random effects, such as crits and mad-milk. You can over-dose from taking too much at once, that is, if it's even possible to do that)
Chat tips on how to play (!help, !howtoplay, !tips)

### Current contributors
Pierce 'NameUser' Strine - Idea, coding
[Your name could be here!]

We are currently looking for more contributors!

### Progress
Coding - 1%
Sound - 0%
Models - 0%
Maps - 0%
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
